https://myanimelist.net/reviews.php?id=4.Title: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo... - HeavyRainHino's Review - MyAnimeList.net
Data: MyAnimeList.net      Hide AdsLoginSign Up  AllAnimeMangaCharactersPeopleCompaniesManga StoreNewsFeatured ArticlesForumClubsUsers               View all results for ${ keyword }  Anime  Anime Search Top Anime Seasonal Anime Videos Reviews Recommendations 2022 ChallengeFantasy Anime League  Manga  Manga Search Top Manga Manga Store Reviews Recommendations 2022 Challenge   Community  Interest Stacks Forums Clubs Blogs Users   Industry  News Featured Articles People Characters Companies MAL×Japan   Watch  Episode Videos Anime Trailers  Read  Manga Store   Help  About Support Advertising FAQ Report StaffMAL Supporter     Reviews                Top                             >                 Anime                             >                 Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Gi...                             >                 Reviews                             >                 HeavyRainHino's Review                               Apr 7, 2022                    13 of 13 episodes seen                 Overall Rating:         4          Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo Minai  (Anime) add            (All reviews)                         HeavyRainHino (All reviews)   1                people found this review helpful                           more pics      Overall 4   Story 3   Animation 6   Sound 6   Character 2   Enjoyment 4                              This is the definition of mediocrity hidden by a pretty face in kinky clothes. The story is poor and the only interesting factor to it is the supernatural feel the affects of the syndromes can cause but other than that the writing is generic and the love interests are nowhere near interesting in the slightest and the sequences and consequences feel very underwhelming. But that is far from the only problem as the characters are very bland except Futaba Rio who has a lackluster role for the majority of it anyway. Not only are they very generic they offer nothing in dialogue or playing with emotions even though that’s the main goal of their existence as they don’t attempt to provide anything else with the characters, sequences or plot. Which is why it has very little to offer except it’s pretty good opening theme song               Helpful       report

https://myanimelist.net/reviews.php?id=4.Title: Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte kara - astralbolt's Review - MyAnimeList.net
Data: MyAnimeList.net      Hide AdsLoginSign Up  AllAnimeMangaCharactersPeopleCompaniesManga StoreNewsFeatured ArticlesForumClubsUsers               View all results for ${ keyword }  Anime  Anime Search Top Anime Seasonal Anime Videos Reviews Recommendations 2022 ChallengeFantasy Anime League  Manga  Manga Search Top Manga Manga Store Reviews Recommendations 2022 Challenge   Community  Interest Stacks Forums Clubs Blogs Users   Industry  News Featured Articles People Characters Companies MAL×Japan   Watch  Episode Videos Anime Trailers  Read  Manga Store   Help  About Support Advertising FAQ Report StaffMAL Supporter     Reviews                Top                             >                 Anime                             >                 Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte kara                             >                 Reviews                             >                 astralbolt's Review                               Apr 7, 2022                    13 of 13 episodes seen                 Overall Rating:         10          Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte kara  (Anime) add            (All reviews)                         astralbolt (All reviews)   0                people found this review helpful                           more pics      Overall 10   Story 8   Animation 8   Sound 8   Character 10   Enjoyment 10                              This is a good anime.  Literally the only complaint I have with it is that the episodes are so ridiculously short and I wanted more from each episode. I honestly wouldn't even have complained if all the shorts were merged into one long episode. This is wholesomeness at its peak, and I feel like people don't realize that it is a REAL THING for a person to not be able to express their real feelings unless they are drunk. Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte kara is meant to be watched solely for the aspect of cuteness and wholesomeness that the shorts give with their characters and settings. I will say that if you're watching this with heavier expectations then leave while you still can, because it's a lighthearted and wholesome romantic short series that's meant to be watched, enjoyed, appreciated and allow you to move on with the rest of your day with a fluffy feeling in your heart. (Maybe you'll feel very sadly single, sorry, that's a you problem. You shouldn't be watching romance at all if that's the case)  Story: ~ (how you gonna expect me to rate the story of an anime that doesn't have a plot?) Art: 8 Sound: 8 Character: 10 Enjoyment: 10 Overall: 10/10 without a doubt.              Helpful       report

https://myanimelist.net/reviews.php?id=4.Title: Kuzu no Honkai - Cl1mberc4t1's Review - MyAnimeList.net
Data: MyAnimeList.net      Hide AdsLoginSign Up  AllAnimeMangaCharactersPeopleCompaniesManga StoreNewsFeatured ArticlesForumClubsUsers               View all results for ${ keyword }  Anime  Anime Search Top Anime Seasonal Anime Videos Reviews Recommendations 2022 ChallengeFantasy Anime League  Manga  Manga Search Top Manga Manga Store Reviews Recommendations 2022 Challenge   Community  Interest Stacks Forums Clubs Blogs Users   Industry  News Featured Articles People Characters Companies MAL×Japan   Watch  Episode Videos Anime Trailers  Read  Manga Store   Help  About Support Advertising FAQ Report StaffMAL Supporter     Reviews                Top                             >                 Anime                             >                 Kuzu no Honkai                             >                 Reviews                             >                 Cl1mberc4t1's Review                               Apr 7, 2022                    12 of 12 episodes seen                 Overall Rating:         3          Kuzu no Honkai  (Anime) add            (All reviews)                         Cl1mberc4t1 (All reviews)   0                people found this review helpful                           more pics      Overall 3   Story 2   Animation 6   Sound 4   Character 2   Enjoyment 2                              Potential trigger warning for spoiler and in that spoiler mention of SA Oh no....here we go.... So I watched this in 2020, but I just made the MAL account and really wanted to give this anime a review because of how strongly I disliked it.   This anime was such a slog to get through, I felt like I was wading through the densest of marshes, trudging along, and just absolutely miserable.   Story 2 Holy cow, this story was....ridiculous. The web of love triangle felt so complicated, I made a fricken diagram. It seems that everyone loves everyone, and it was so annoying. It's one big drama fest and it felt as there was no payoff or any satisfaction to anything.   Art 6 Okay here is the one "bright spot" in the anime and by bright spot I mean the anime wasn't horrendous looking. I liked the transitions and color splotches of people's feelings. The art was fine.   Sound 4 Not much to say, the sound was decent.   Character 2 None of the characters were LIKEABLE or even really relatable, they were missing any sort of realistic element, like caricatures of humans. I can understand using intimacy as a coping method for a multitude of reasons, and at the same time so many of these characters motivations were so convoluted and entangled beyond just using people for sex/intimacy that it became unbelievable. The characters are written to such a degree of extra, every problem they have has to be like magnified to such a stupid degree.  It never felt like the characters did anything that redeemed their terrible actions.  Some of the scenes were so uncomfortable, and like consent was missing in some of the more explicit scenes. Again it felt as though consequences were missing and people's actions didn't really hold all that much weight.   It was just kinda disgusting.  Conclusion I would not recommend this anime, the only reason I would recommend it is because sometimes it is fun to get mad at television, sometimes it is fun to watch garbage with others and enjoy their reactions. The story was awful, the characters were downright non-sensical and just shitty. There was nothing really about this anime that felt redeeming except maybe the art which as said before was alright, I liked the transitions.               Helpful       report
